def_cn: 铁幕(指前苏联、东欧共产主义国家与西欧国家的边境)
def_en: People referred to the border that separated the Soviet Union and the communist countries of Eastern Europe from the Western European countries as the Iron Curtain .

def_cn: (国家)铁幕背后的(指前苏联及其东欧盟国)
def_en: People used to refer to the Soviet Union and its East European allies as the Iron Curtain countries.
